S

ServerComm - Class in Communication
This class implements the communication channel, on the server side, for a message based communication over sockets using the TCP protocol.
ServerComm(int) - Constructor for class Communication.ServerComm
Communication channel instantiation (first form).
ServerComm(int, ServerSocket) - Constructor for class Communication.ServerComm
Communication channel instantiation (second form).
serviceEnd() - Method in class Locations.GeneralInformationRepo
Terminate the logger service.
serviceEnd - Static variable in class MainPackage.MainProgram
Used to check if the service must terminate.
